name: df-trrel
body: |- wb(wtrrel(c0), wa(wss(ccom(cin(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cin(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), cin(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), wrel(c0)))
comment: Define the transitive relation predicate. (Read: ` R ` is a transitive relation.) For sets, being an element of the class of transitive relations ( ~ df-trrels ) is equivalent to satisfying the transitive relation predicate, see ~ eltrrelsrel . Alternate definitions are ~ dftrrel2 and ~ dftrrel3 . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 17-Jul-2021.)
